channel.title: Nrs3 725 cache/kill lagg
channel.description:
I just finished my update now I'm having 2 main problems one is when I update my cache my client crashes unable to add new sprites
Next is the main thing I'd like to finish first after I kill a npc there is a kill lagg by this I mean the npc does not die rite away it stays still for 2-3minutes then dies off pain when doing fight caves. If anyone has fix plez let me know

item.title: Nrs3 725 cache/kill lagg
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Eaffon:

Ive had no problems with the 725 cache, except that the assassin costume/other items wont fit my character correctly…

yes but im not using matrix source im using my own i’ve done more then the source that was released

And cache inst corrupted u tried matrix cache also they say 723 but it’s actually a 725 cache in there source
